about_the_game:
LIMITATIONS OF DEMO VERSION

- Only Classic Bomberman camera (no First and Thirs person)
- Only one character (Ninja) to play
- Only one map to play
- Only 4 players max
- No achievements
- No leaderboard

MAKE BOMBERMAN GREAT AGAIN


Re-creation of the Classic! In the reborn BomberMan, you can now choose one of 4 characters to BLAST the LAST enemy and survive.

FEATURES


    [2-8 player online PvP3 types of camera: Classic Bomberman, First Person and Third Person cameras4 characters to choose4 ultimates that can change the winnerCreate the party with invited friendsJoin to the random party with strangersSome stuff on the map can be destroyed]

short_description: Old classic Bomber Man in new point of view! Your goal is simple: Blast all enemies by the bombs. Go alone with up to 8 players or assemble the party in online PvP. Choose one of 4 characters, use your specific ultimate, be smart and create strategies to win.
